name: add
objective: A device can be added from the Bluetooth panel
description: It should be possible to pair a device from the Bluetooth applet
pre_condition: - Bluetooth technology is enabled - Bluetooth switcher is toggled on 'ON'

steps.description: Click on the '+' button to pair a new device and wait
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard appears and searching for devices. Available Bluetooth devices appears

author: zingile

name: remove
objective: A bluetooth device can be removed
description: When a device has been added, it should be possible to remove the added device in the list of the paired devices.
pre_condition: A device in the list of the paired devices in the Bluetooth panel

steps.description: Click on the '-' button to remove the device
steps.expected: A window appears and asking you for confirmation
Device should disappear in the list of device in Bluetooth panel and Bluetooth applet

author: zingile
